content: [sound:annoyed03|emotion:sad|onscreen:true|shadow:false|zoomin:true]There is a deep sadness in Octavian’s eyes as he looks at you. The song of your dreams slowly begins to fade.
[emotion:sad|onscreen:true|shadow:false|zoomin:true]“Come with me, Abysswalker…” He turns to walk across the deck of the ship. You follow closely, wondering just what this truth could be.

content.option: “Have I done something wrong, Captain Tidebreaker?”

content: [sound:arr03|emotion:sad|onscreen:true|shadow:false|zoomin:true]“No, no, nothin’ wrong… ye followed yer heart and it led ye here…” He stops walking when you reach the great hatch in the center of the deck.

content.option: “Then why do you look so disappointed?”

content: [emotion:sad|onscreen:true|shadow:false|zoomin:true]Octavian removes a large iron lock and throws the hatch open. “Aye… Because of the duty I ‘ave sworn me eternal soul to, and the love I fear I will never see again…”
[emotion:sad|onscreen:true|shadow:false|zoomin:true]You peer over the edge “The truth. That duty is the death of love.” Suddenly you are shoved by Octavian.

[emotion:sad|onscreen:true|shadow:false|zoomin:false]A massive tentacle wraps around your waist, dragging you down through the open hatch. Screams and cries of a thousand souls surround you as you watch the saddened Octavian slowly closing the hatch above you…
